name: Zesh AI Layer
description: Zesh AI is an innovative, AI-driven platform revolutionizing the Web3 ecosystem. Leveraging LLMs and blockchain, it empowers projects, KOLs, and communities with tools for engagement, campaign optimization, and authenticity. AI-Powered Precision Zesh Influence AI and Zesh Engage AI use advanced analytics to predict campaign success, track engagement, and verify participants. Fraud Prevention Zesh AI ID detects and eliminates bots and Sybil attacks in real time. Seamless Integration Unified analytics and NFT-based achievements enhance community engagement. Deflationary $ZAI Token $ZAI powers the ecosystem with utility, staking, and a deflationary model for long-term growth.
